import axios from 'axios' import React from 'react' import useInput from '../hooks/formHook' const NewUser=()=>{ const name=useInput() const userName=useInput() const email=useInput() const submitHandler=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() axios.post('/newUser', {name:name.value, user:userName, email:email.value}) } return(
{/*

This username is available

*/}
{/*

This email is invalid

*/}
) } export default NewUser
